page.title: 08Symmingtons
page.content: A group from our class visited the clothing section of Symingtons,a local firm who make garments such as {corsets, swim-wear, anoraks and {lingerie.}Symingtons employ 200 people, 70 work in the office and 130 cut the material. There are other branches at Rugby, Whittlesey and Peterborough. The various jobs include designing,and office work. Most are employed on the machinery. Their products are supplied to major stores. "MOTHERCARE"is the main store that they send them too. People come to order from as far afield as London, Liverpool, Manchester and Tammworth. Most of the lorries don't belong to {Symingtons.}They belong to the shops, to take their orders, because {SYMINGTONS}only have 2 of their own.
